TopicTitle: Is there any way to make RemoteTech work with a Kerbalism-like system?

Articles.Content:
Sorry if this question was posted before, couldnt find anything like this.

I love Kerbalism, the real time simulation that calculates every ships resources, food, oxygen in the background. But I just cant play without RemoteTech. So my question: Is there anything I can do to make a system that work like the combination of the two mods above?
ShotgunNinja has already said that the next version of Kerbalism will disable its own antenna/control mechanic if it detects that RT is installed.
